name: Morph (itch) (Jaozin)
description:
Made for "The "I have 5 dollars left on a prepaid card" jam".

You are a ball. You transform into a bullet. Shoot yourself on other enemies.

The game is roguelike-based; You go infinitely through the right, going through sets of rooms(stages). Each 2 stages completed increase enemy (max) spawn by one.

CONTROLS:

Rotate with mouse

Move with WASD

Shoot yourself with LButton(Short) and RButton(Long)

TOOLS:
Game Engine: Unity
3D Modelling tool: Blender
SFX: sfxr
Music: FL Studio

BUGS:
oh, there are many
